rows.description: Calling all creatives and VG worship servers to join our creative/worship community in V!
Ever wanted to welcome someone home to the Father's house? We are the team that owns the auditorium space, ready to welcome everyone in and help them find their one-in-a-5000 seat.
As the first point of contact for service attendees, the Ops team starts the service experience and helps to guide the lost!
The Stage Crew supports the VN programme, pulling together the various VN teams and the elements of the service.
The Video team prepares and project lyrics, verses, slides, other visuals; as well as operates the live camera feed at VN.
Do you like talking to people and getting them connected to community? Or do you like praying for others? Or maybe you simply want to know what LORO actually means? Join us to find out!
